text: Jens Bertil Georg Nilsson (25 September 1948 – 13 March 2018) was a Swedish politician. He served as a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for Sweden from 2009 to 2018. He was a member of the Social Democrats, part of the Progressive Alliance of Socialists and Democrats. Nilsson died on 13 March 2018 in Brussels, Belgium at the age of 69.EU-parlamentsledamoten Jens Nilsson död ==References== ==Other websites== *Jens Nilsson on the European Parliament webpage (Swedish) Category:1948 births Category:2018 deaths Category:MEPs for Sweden
title: Jens Nilsson
